ARABIC: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِى ضَلَٰلَةٌ وَلَٰكِنِّى رَسُولٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My people, I am not in error at all but rather am a Messenger from the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I have not gone astray, O my people," he said, "but have been sent by my Lord, the creator of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: 'O my people! There is no error in me, but I am a Messenger from the Lord of the universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Noah) said, "My people, I am not in any error, rather I am a Messenger from the Lord of the Universe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “O my people! There is no straying in me – I am in fact a Noble Messenger from the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Nuh] said: "O my people! There is no error in me, but I am a Messenger from the Lord of all that exists!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my people! there is no error in me, but I am an apostle from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'My people, there is no error in me; but I am a Messenger from the Lord of all Being.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: O my people! There is no error in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Said [Noah], "O my people! I am not in error. Indeed, I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: O my people! not with me is the error, but I am an apostle from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘O my people, I am not in error. Rather, I am an apostle from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my people! No wandering is there in my (mind): on the contrary I am a messenger from the Lord and Cherisher of the worlds!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Nuh (Noah)] said: "O my people! There is no error in me, but I am a Messenger from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I am not in error, my nation' he replied. 'I am a Messenger from the Lord of the Worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “O my people, I am not in error, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Noah] said, "O my people, there is not error in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:61] He said, ‘My people, there is no error in me (dalāla is more general than al-dalāl, ‘misguidance’, and so to deny it is more effective than to deny the latter), but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: my people! There is no error) foolishness (in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds) to you.
